PerfectNetExp.abs: 封地的的英文|封地的是什么意思|Show秀网... ... 的封地 ： appanage 王子的封地 ： appanage 中间领主的封地 ： mesnalty.
的统治之下的封地(appanage)。[11]肯特郡也被沿着新的领土界限而不是旧的土地所有权界限进行了划分。[12]大体说来,这6个边境或者海岸郡构成了威廉王国的大约.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French, based on medieval Latin appanare 'provide with the means of subsistence', from ad- 'to' + panis 'bread'

means.word_mean: 1. any customary and rightful perquisite appropriate to your station in life;

sentences.sentence: "for thousands of years the chair was an appanage of state and dignity rather than an article of ordinary use"

means.word_mean: 2. a grant (by a sovereign or a legislative body) of resources to maintain a dependent member of a ruling family;

sentences.sentence: "bishoprics were received as appanages for the younger sons of great families"
